content:
@matklad whlie invoking a goto_def query with ra_lsp_server, the resp is a bit not accurate.
pasted image
in this case, gotdodef is expected to jump to **/hir/** , but it returns a "fuzzy-search". did I mis-config something?
Yeah, goto def is not 100% precise yet. This case seems like it should just work. Could you minimize the test case?
